website_summaries.verdict: With 7 interchangeable blades, you can cut onions and many other vegetables into a variety of shapes and sizes.
pros: Molded finger guards and rubberized nonskid base
Can use for multiple shapes and vegetables
cons: May need to cut onion into halves or quarters to make it fit in slicer without breaking

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very versatile. Makes dicing onions a piece of cake. This product gets lots of use in our household.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Bourquin

customer_reviews.title: Great for chopping and more.
customer_reviews.text: I have clearly been chopping vegetables all wrong. I just wanted something to dice vegetables evenly and quickly and this does that and more. The blades are sharp and does a great job with onions but it also acts as a mandoline, grater and spiralizer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazinggggggg!!! I love it!! It has many pieces to it, but it's really easy to use and clean and it works SO well!! I would definitely buy it again. I'm such a uniformity weirdo and it dices perfectly. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift she is very happy with it and has used it multiple times so far. Her favorite is slicing her vegetables thin for salads
customer_reviews.author: amanda wilkins

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chopper thus far!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite mandoline/chopper, etc. It is strong enough to literally do everything, and I love how everything is organized together for storage. Sometimes, I want an easy chop, slice, etc when I'm cooking on a weekend night and these instruments are wonderful at getting the job done quick. I can't speak for everyone, but I even throw mine in the dishwasher for an easy clean and it doesn't dull the blades or anything. This is a must have as far as kitchen gadgets go! And it requires very little cabinet space for storage...win win in my book!
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Love this mandoline
customer_reviews.text: Love this mandoline! Just got it and have already used it multiple times. The box shows all of the cutting pieces which make it easy to chop multiple vegetables quickly for recipes.
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I hate chopping vegetable. The least desireable aspect of cooking in my opnion, but this product changes all that. It tells you not to cut tomatoes but I was able to do that with no problem. I have’t used the noodle components, but everything as has worked great. I didn’t even realize it came with a no-cut glove which is great. This makes getting my veggies prepped so much easier and I’m really glad I bought it. More cooking and salads in my future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: broken Fullstar chopper
customer_reviews.text: Have used this sparingly over the past six months and it picks Thanksgiving to break. Caused me to throw out a full bag of chopped onions because I could not find all the splintered pieces. Very unhappy with this product and now believe it is not safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to cut
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews about how hard it was to slice but I thought I would try it anyway. It wouldn't even cut an onion all the way through and as a result, I am sending it back. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ptamom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Practically have to sit on it to get it to slice or cut
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Container Breaks
customer_reviews.text: It chops great and does what it says it will but, twice the bottom container has broke when pushing down to chop vegetables. After the first one broke the second we made sure to press as softly as we could with vegetables cut as small as possible before using and it the container yet again broke. If the bottom container was made out of a sturdy material that did not break I would have gave this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: no where near what was expected. way to hard to chop and I'm a 260lb guy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great on fingertips, lousy on vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Blades have cut my fingertips plenty, gently picking it up from sink, yep , blood everywhere. Trying to Unstick an uncut carrot, yep, more blood on the countertop (yes, I know it comes equipped with a silly little glove, are we supposed to wash the blades with gloved hands ?) . One would think such a sharp little blade would slice vegetables with ease, but , one would be grossly mistaken. Won’t cut onions or carrots unless you try to precut into smaller pieces (even then, marginal performance) or if you stomp on it , I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: NemaIpa

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love this slicer/dicer. I have put this thing through it's paces since it arrived. Using it to cut up fruits and veggies for dehydrating, so they have to be cut nice & evenly & thin. The little storage kit is a nice touch, keeps everything together & handy, but its a little (how to put this nicely?) clunky and cumbersome? It would be nicer if everything just fit into the clear receiving bin, if it were just a little bit bigger everything would (-2 stars). The included cut glove was a nice touch (+1 star), definitely saved my thumb quite a few times - never use it without wearing the cut glove!
customer_reviews.author: Kent T.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. At first, it was a little hard to figure out but I think I got it! I have a busy life and I’m also trying to get into cooking (finally) as I’m trying to make a life change with how I’m eating. This is a game changer and time saver for chopping. I haven’t used many of the other slicers but I’m sure they are great. I definitely recommend this product and I love how it comes with a little piece to put all your different choppers and what not in. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the blades!
customer_reviews.text: This chopper has been wonderful! Unfortunately the small square dicer insert broke on me yesterday. I think I know why it happened though. The block that pushes food through the dicer got food stuck in it, and eventually pushed back hard enough on one of the strips of metal and pushed it out of place and permanently damaged it. On a side note, the blades on this are very sharp. Be careful when cleaning any of the inserts, as to not cut yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Simply life changing. Haven’t tried all the blades yet, just 4 (out of 7). It’s really great and save a LOT of time! Super easy to clean too. Be careful and use the glove though.
customer_reviews.author: Mariabile

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Designed extremely well. Built very well. Gave it only 4 stars because the manual is NOT as clear as it could be. A video would be quite helpful. UPDATE: Starting using it and it is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Great but be careful
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Absolutely love it, works perfectly and don’t need much strength. However, you need to be careful these things are extremely sharp and can cut you very easily as it has to me. Wear the gloves they give you it should prevent you from cutting urself. But if ur careful unlike me, then I highly recommend this product if u get tired cutting everything urself and want to make things easier
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine my kitchen life without it.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. I use it every single day. I have a salad every day for lunch & this chopper makes it so easy to prepare & saves me oodles of time. I can't image my kitchen life without it. I've been using the vidalia chopper for a few years & destroyed it from. This is is way better made & has so many great options for chopping & slicing. I love how it stores too. So tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Family

customer_reviews.title: Works but....
customer_reviews.text: So with this chopper you get what you pay for. First off let me say it functions perfectly and that is the good part. The bad part is the attachments and design. The Mandolin attchment isn't adjustable so every thing you slice will be painfully slim. As for the chopper blades they work great however in order for the chopper to work it has to be attached to the small rectangular dish that will fill up after one or if you are lucky 2 potatoes. This product works as intended but I wish I had bought a model with better attachments and a larger base.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Item was a no go for me
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work out for me at all. When I received it, I attempted to chop some red onions in the finer blade. I had to apply so much pressure to get them through the plastic was creaking and sounded like it was about to break. It went through peppers just fine but not the onions I tried. I returned it without a problem but wish that it would have worked to save me a lot of prep time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: STRONGLY RECOMMENDED FOR ANYONE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CHOPPER! Best thing ever! So easy to use! Can chop things in less then 10 mins! For example cutting a bag of potatoes usually takes about 30 mins....with the chopper got the whole bag chopped in 5 mins or less! Plus with my wrist issues it saves my wrist! I can get more things chopped in less time! Although it has many other uses the large chopper part is definitely my favorite! I strongly recommend buying this for anyone. Also theres barely any effort needed to clean it or use it. Just cut the potato in half, lay it on the chopper, press down, done!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What do you say so people know this isnt a fake review... I know! I'll post a pic:) I am so pleased! And it comes with a little container to put all your parts in!! I put mine in different than the pic shows. I had a cheaper one and broke the blades so had to get a new one and decided to go with this one and I couldn't be more please so far. I only paid $26
customer_reviews.author: reallywant2know

customer_reviews.title: Must pre slice everything super thin before chopping
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about 8 months. I'm giving it a 1 star review because the blade broke while chopping onions. It has the potential to be a great product if it was more sturdy and if you didn't have to pre slice everything into 1/2 inch or thinner thickness pieces before chopping. Plus even though the onion was already sliced into thin pieces the blade still broke after completely normal use. I just ordered the Mueller chopper to replace it. I'm hoping it is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Kitchen Accessory and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most useful items in my kitchen now. It really cuts anything, i havent tried sweet potatoes because it recommends not to but cutting brussel sprouts only takes me about 1 minute now. It comes with everything you would need, is easy to clean...the only thing i dislike is the base where the stuff falls in is a tad shallow, but that is easily fixed by just emptying it out into another bowl. Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W

customer_reviews.title: The best part is how easy the inserts are to switch ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all kitchens!!!! Has been cutting my prep time by over half since I got it. Be careful though, blades are Extremely sharp and have stayed sharp! The best part is how easy the inserts are to switch out. Makes it so very easy to just pop out, rinse and reuse or switch to another. I've used it for onions, mushrooms, tomatoes, jalapenos, garlic, carrots, zucchini, cheese, you name it. It has been a saver in my kitchen to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyP65

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I originally posted that I loved this thing. However, after about 1 month of use, it ran out of umph! The blades got extremely dull and wouldn't cut any longer. I loved it while it lasted though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves you time!
customer_reviews.text: We feed a large family. We bought this ahead of Thanksgiving. Normally we spend a lot of time cutting up onions and such. This product took a long and tearful chore and helped us finish it in a very few happy minutes. As to the somewhat lower rating on durability, I can only speak to the one time use so far. I will adjust later. I have reservations about how long the various cutters will remain as sharp as they came, so that's the only reason for that rating - the unknown. Still, we are very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality, Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I almost felt duped when I first used this product. It's advertised as a "Slicer Dicer" when in reality all the machine does is julienne veggies or fruits. To dice an onion it must be sliced into about 1/4" slices and then laid on the blades for dicing. It does save a few steps, but the instructions don't spell that out, you have to figure that out on your own. Then to make matters worse after only 3 uses as I was dicing an onion a blade broke. Really?!?!? After only 3 uses?
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little tool to have handy in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool to have handy in your kitchen. It takes the work out of cutting up veges and/or fruit, gets the job done so much faster. The blades are very sharp, no struggles cutting through anything. It is easy to store and clean which makes it even better. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Slicer
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to only use the slicing function, but I absolutely love it. I sliced a cucumber and some lemons for flavored water, and it was eerily so easy to do. But be careful, because it can be very easy to slice a finger! I love the whole setup, it comes with a holder for all the blades, a glove, vegetable stabbers, it's great! I've always wanted one. Can't wait to make zoodles!
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year, maybe. For the things we need it for (squash, sweet potatoes, etc), the cubing blades are not sharp at all and the entire thing just cracked because we put too much pressure on it trying to cut a small slice of sweet potato. The harder veggies are the ones that we needed this most for, and the fact that it can't do those at all makes it pretty useless for us. :\ It's nice for the softer ones, though?
customer_reviews.author: Sara Walker

customer_reviews.title: Blades are very sharp, doesn't cut sweet potatoes or garlic well
customer_reviews.text: The blades are very sharp as it says. I've inadvertently cut myself twice already when cleaning the blades. Unfortunately it doesn't chop garlic great and sweet potatoes are difficult. It also doesn't really chop the potatoes into wedges really just pieces so if you're wanting "potato wedges" this isn't for you. But it definitely does what it is supposed to overall. I've so far only used 2 of the 7 options, just the dicers. I don't see myself using the spiralizer but needed the 7 blade one for the mandoline slicer that cuts cucumbers into chips etc.
customer_reviews.author: BRose

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The product has lots of functions - haven't used all of them...yet. Does a very nice job on slicing. Did cucumbers, potatoes. Has to been firm food for the dicer. Tried watermelon and it just mashed it into mush. Has a great storage design. Should consider this for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: bombercoach11

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Asset
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few days ago and have used it to slice zucchini and to dice onions & bell peppers. It works quite well. A little pre-slicing helps the dicing process along. It would be nice if the slicer were adjustable but for the price it's just fine. Wish I'd had one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Prati Moksha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT - it works efficiently!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This one is great as it has a little storage bin that holds all the blades in an orderly and safe fashion! My salads look so much nicer with the consistent, clean small chops! Speeds up the process quite a bit too! Have already purchased another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT WORTH MORE
customer_reviews.text: I really hated to go shopping for these choppers. I’ve heard horror stories where these items just plain sucK. What a relief in finding one that does exactly what it’s supposed to do. Manufacturer FULLSTAR should be commended in making a chopper, dicer, slicer that easy to use and made from sturdy high impact plastic and steel blades. This gives the item weight. I diced tomatoes even though it’s not recommended. Little mess, no fuss. Well crafted but watch those blades! They include a high quality glove which I didn’t use and cut my thumb! A great all around product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I love this, unfortunately I broke my container as I dropped it from six feet high, I have to replace, but if I can’t find just that one part I would buy the whole thing over again because I use it every single day, I’m not even exaggerating. It is so helpful on my keto diet, quick dicing, slicing, and super super sharp so I definitely use the glove all the time. The glove is great, works well and I don’t get cut at all. The spiralizer is a bit annoying, I don’t use that very often. It’s manual so much more difficult to get good zoodles out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Emzizme

customer_reviews.title: Cuts things like hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely incredible. I bought it primarily because I needed more uniformity in the size of potatoes used for fries. The first night I used the small chop blade for mushrooms and it made quick work of 2 pounds. Tonight I finally used it for fries and it sliced right through half of a huge russet potato like a hot knife to butter. I had to cut the potato in half to accommodate for the size of the container. Worth every single penny. I highly recommend! And one thing I hadn’t realized about it was that it came with a little organizer for all the blades. SOOOO thankful for that!
customer_reviews.author: A.Zal

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not that great in the kitchen, this chopper helps me a lot. it's good quality and comes with a bunch of slice and dice options but i really use one or two of them.. the clean up is easy except for the tiny squares.. use a brush, i keep cutting my finger on it. I love this thing, just be careful when you clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Elan

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the main thing I bought it for: slicing tomatoes with a consistent thickness. But, the holder for the mandolin slicer's holder just isn't well designed to hold food in place when you're slicing it. If I personally had much use for the all of the other slicers and dicers, I'm sure the versatility would earn it 5 stars from me. But, I don't and the mandolin slicer just isn't spectacular for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for dicing!
customer_reviews.text: I have not really yet used other features but I love this tool for the dicing alone. It is my favorite kitchen tool especially for quickly slicing teary yellow onions. I have had other brands and they have broken but this one is holding its own. I use it 3-4 times a week. There is some prepping of the item to be diced by cutting or slicing into smaller pieces but its is not much work really. Unfortunately there is some cleaning that has to be done when finished but the cleaning tool makes it go way smoother. It was a true aid during the holidays for all those veggies.
customer_reviews.author: DJ.

customer_reviews.title: Saves tons of time!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great chopper! Has a BUNCH of different attachments....will take up space which is why I gave the -1 star but the thing rocks...have not had the chance to do all the attachments because of so many!!! Love the thing you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very sharp blades. I give it 4 stars because the slicer makes very thick slices. I prefer slices of things to be about half as thick as the blade provides. The cubing and spiralizing attachments are AWESOME. I make a lot of salads and this unit is really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Hollybadger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it was for celery, probably the hardest veggie due to the strings. It worked fabulously, no problems at all. I was amazed! anything else I chop should be a breeze.It is well made & easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful what you try to dice on this unit. I tried to dice celery and found out very quickly not to try that again. It does dice onions, potatoes, and red peppers nicely. The company really needs to give a list of vegetables that can be diced. The video they give to watch online isn’t much help as far as using and cleaning are concerned. It’s a little hard to clean even with the tools that are given so sometimes it may be easier just to use a knife. BE SURE to always wear the glove that’s given or have a big box of bandages.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 more
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and use it for EVERYTHING! (Especially onions) it saves the hassle of the smell on your hands & the tears in your eyes. I can easily dice 3 large onions in less time than dicing with a knife. I have also used it for Tomatoes (Skin side up), Bell Peppers (Skin side up) and even diced grapes for a salad. lol. I wish I would have known about these years ago. I bought 2 more for Christmas presents for my Mother and Mother in law
customer_reviews.author: Witczek

customer_reviews.title: Love it for chopping veggies
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for chopping onions and peppers. I've found that you have to lay the pieces pretty flat in the machine to get evenly chopped pieces. If pieces are too thick it's very hard to push down the top. I wish that it had a chopping disk between the two sizes. One is very small, and the other quite large. The mandolin is very useful too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Wow, better than expected and useful
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Better than expected and I use it at least once a week doing meal prep. Makes short work of onions and many veggies. Carrots and celery are a little touch to use the mincing base, but cutting them thinner is fine with us. I would buy this again. Makes weekly meal prep much easier. We tossed the accessory storage pieces as we store it in a drawer so the blades are protected without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend for south indian cooking
customer_reviews.text: Makes my job easy. I use the small cubes for carrot, radish, long beans, onion, bell peppers. Didnt work for potato first time, but didnt make another effort with potato; So not sure. I use it once/twice a week for cut and store veggies. I use the veggies for fried rice, semolina upma, southern style bean mix. Cleaning is a hazzle, takes 10 minutes to clean all the crevices, that makes it hard for everyday use. But this is really helpful for a family of 5 who eat a bowl of veggies(each) everyday. It has been a great relief for corona cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ramakrishnan Venkatesan

customer_reviews.title: Fast, uniform cuts and slices!
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking recipes from Forks Over Knives but chopping all the veggies can take a lot of time. This thing is amazing at how quickly and uniformly it can break down a load of veggies! But, be careful! The blades are extremely sharp- as they should be. It is very easy to knick yourself or outright have a major injury. This is not a kitchen tool for the kids. I think the manufacturer has taken all possible precautions and the design is as safe as possible. But, if you have good hand-eye coordination and cook with a lot of veggies, this thing (plus the Grillers Garlic Press) is a kitchen game changer!
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: This product had some great reviews so I decided to go ahead and buy it and maybe it's just not for me, but I personally found it difficult to clean, and store with the bajillion things it comes with which was a no from me. I found it easier to just cut with a knife. But, it does dice pretty well so if you're looking for a gadget that can dice hard vegetables in mass quantity, then maybe this is for you. Also, USE THE GLOVE (I didn't and my thumb payed for it).
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, well made, use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I have tried maybe 5 of these type of things now. I buy them, try them, and always end up returning. The Fullstar Veggie chopper has been the best by far. It is very affordable, is well made, and does the job. I love the way it all stores within the container and is easy to put it away on a shelf. Last thing I wanted was another device on the counter. This chopper gets a lot of use, holds up well in dishwasher, and cleans up very easily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mcateer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy something that doesn’t try to do too much
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. I find the square cut blades difficult to clean. The mandolin or straight cut is not adjustable so the slices are larger than them I would like. Cheaper quality than I would like if I get a year out of it then ok good but if I had know what it was gonna be like I would have saved my money and gotten so,etching different as it is I bought a separate over the bowl mandolin slicer.
customer_reviews.author: vanesa hayden

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried to use it I cut my finger tip and it hurt pretty bad for a couple days. There is a good reason they provide a cut-proof glove with this thing! My lady-friend won't touch it unfortunately. Otherwise is is OK, maybe a little too complicated. The old adjustable "banjo" type we had does about the same thing with the addition of 2 sizes of slices instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Versatile thingy majig
customer_reviews.text: Prep work is always what takes up most of my time in the kitchen, with this new versatile kitchen thingy it makes prepping so easy! I actually look forward to using this thing. The blades on everything are super sharp so you just have to be careful with the fingers of yours. Also be very careful washing! It’s not the easiest to clean but it comes with three little things to help get in the nooks and crannies!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Useful gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Originally I bought it to dice sweet potatoes, but in reading through the instructions you are not supposed to. Luckily, another reviewer said to microwave sweet potatoes for about two minutes, and it works perfectly! I’ve also use this with onions, green peppers, and tomatoes. Sometimes you do have to slam the dicer down really hard or it won’t cut all the way through. I think that for the price, it does what it supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Allison C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have kitchen tool for meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dicer to help me meal prep faster, and it has definitely done it's job! I now prep all of my veggies for the week, whether for snacking or meals, right when I get home from the grocery store using this and it has been awesome. There are two cleaning tools that are included that make it easy to clean up afterwards. My one complaint is that it says in the instructions not to use harder vegetables like sweet potatoes with the dicers because it will wear down the blades quicker, which I didn't know beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: Britney B.

customer_reviews.title: Serouisly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time today and was very pleased with it. I have read many of the reviews and made my decision from that. It chopped my onions so fast and potatoes as well. My husband and I love homemade veggie soup but I hate all of the chopping. It cut my prep time in half if not more when using the Fullstar Vegetable Chopper Mandoline Slicer Dicer. Great Product!! Also heed the warning and use the glove...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cutter - especially the dicer attachment is a lifesaver to chop onions. You can just cut in half, place in the dicer and press down - done. So much faster than cutting by hand. There are also a lot of other attachments for various slicing and cutting tasks, though I haven't used those too much yet. Also like that it comes with protective gloves to use as the blades are quite sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over 2 years and it gets heavy use ... this is the only one that has lasted more than a few months in our house ... I now have one at work since we are using the kitchenette all the time ... and my coworkers are ordering their own ... this saves me so so much time ... my husband and my teen son also use all the time ... one tool we al love ...
customer_reviews.author: jane next door

customer_reviews.title: High recommendation
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I used it for the first time. I am very surprised by the quality and quantity of functions. In addition there is a small box formed to organize all the blades and spiral blades. The glove came as described and it worked nicely. I had it in my wish list and it came up on a lightening deal. I highly recommend this. Very low cost. I really like the small size, I live in a tiny home and all things must have multiple functions and store easy. This does more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood

customer_reviews.title: If you DONT cook much this is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for spiralizer but not doesnt work well for that. BUT HAVE TO SAY THIS IS BEST HAND CHOPPER EVER. I cook ALOT this has cut my prep time down to like 3-4 minutes max!!! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS THING!!! but I have noticed it dulls very fast, so I would need to buy 1 every month which I wont be doing.
customer_reviews.author: elefantaflaca

customer_reviews.title: Makes Meal Prep a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a slicer/mandolin for doing my meal prep on a weekly basis. Sunday is meal prep day and i frequently do it with my son. This device allows us to divide and conquer. We used it last week for cheese and veggies. It did a great job and made our whole day easier. The only thing that would make it better is if there was a second reservoir so we didn't have to wash it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Chops, dices & more. Blades are scary since they are so sharp. .Using the included glove is a must to protect my fingers. Unfortunately, I can't find the glove. I have a feeling I accidentally threw it out during cleanup. so I haven't been able to use the chopper since the last time I used it. Trying to figure out how to store all the pieces was a challenge but after trial & error I did it. All in all I"m very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: BEAD MAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this product has good reviews. It is horrible. It is so difficult to use. You have to exert so much pressure just to cut tomatoes which are the softest thing on Earth. It is insane how hard you have to press on the lever to cut tomatoes into cubes to the point that it would hurt your wrists. This product is utter garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! It has so many different attachments and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It has so many different attachments and the best part is it has a little storage container for them. I have had others choppers and they’ve broken within weeks of using them. This one seems sturdy and the blades are sharp so be careful removing from the packaging bc I cut meyself.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy. I especially like that it's so versatile. It does everything I need and is a substantial piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: gtwsmd

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: I don’t need to get my hands dirty, and everything is cut evenly!! It’s a must have in any kitchen, it saves you time and it’s less messy. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Blades didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought I would love the chopper/dicer. But, in the end, the blades just don't hold up to regular use. One of the product pics shows one half of an onion laying atop the dicing grid, ready to be diced in one fell swoop. In my experience, the dicer isn't designed for such use. Anything even half that size would get hung up in the blades and then the blades began to fail. Now, I have a broken blade and no way (that I can find) to replace the part. It languishes in my cabinets and is about to be donated since we're moving...sad!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: It comes in handy.. but
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it a 4 because the finger guard sent to me was too big for my Mandoline machine. I assume they accidentally sent me a finger guard for a bigger machine. It does not store in the box correctly as displayed in the manual. It does not let me completely finish shredding my beet or potatoes. Besides that, it’s a very convenient and nice machine. Diced onion 100% and works very nicely. It’s very very sharp, so be careful when washing it, as my friend almost decapitates her finger off washing it. But anyway, I’m very happy with this. I just hope they send me a smaller finger guard for my machine size.
customer_reviews.author: nathalie d.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for a long time but was afraid I would injure myself if I got one. I make my own lunchables so I chop up cheese, fruit and other items to make it easy to eat on the go. After weighing my options I am happy that I chose this one! Easy to clean, chops quickly and perfectly! Highly recommend! Love that it comes with a glove!
customer_reviews.author: She_Welds

customer_reviews.title: Essential cookware
customer_reviews.text: This has absolutely changed my experience in the kitchen. I used to rarely cook and dread the thought of the prep-time for the ingredients but this has completely changed that. It has cut my prep time by 45+ mins for everything. I am absolutely in love. I love meal-prepping for the week and this makes it so much easier. I’m not sure if the blades might dull eventually from contact with the glove (which is unavoidable) but they haven’t yet and I’ve been using it twice a week for a month now so hopefully it lasts for a good while before I have to replace any blades.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Stonecipher

customer_reviews.title: Two years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chopper for two years and it is still going strong! I use it almost daily for dicing onions and carrots, and I can even slice potatoes for French fries if I put in the potatoes at the proper angle. It really takes a good hard slam from the base of my hand to chop vegetables, but it goes so much faster than hand chopping!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gilcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everything slicing and dicing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much I bought 2 more for presents for family! My grandmother has arthritis and she uses hers to chop her onions up super fast and I meal prep every with my sister so we go to town she slices our veggies while I smash away at dicing! Need to get out some anger start slamming out some diced onions! It's so much fun and easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Very handy & versatile, quick & easy to use, good looking, too!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to modify for different uses. I like the cruncher that creates slivers of potatoes for chips. Used yesterday with full-sized carrots (cheap) to create my own mini chunks of carrot for salads. Breeze to slice onions. Glove is useful & thoughtful. Really well-made, very happy with it. Takes up a fair amount of room, but....
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on some foods, not so much on others, overall worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well for chopping hard foods like peppers, carrots, apples, onions, etc. Works OK on lettuce, cabbage, and tomatoes. Softer things like mushrooms it just turns into mush. Cleaning is a but of a chore, you have to pick scraps out of the blades and the chopping anvil manually with the little pick they provide. Overall, it works pretty well and I use it a lot for some things. If I were to buy it again, I wouldn’t bother with all the side accessories, tried them and they don’t seem too useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: MixerMan

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need besides a cutting board and a knife
customer_reviews.text: So when I first opened up the box it felt overwhelming having all these different parts to the chopper. Once I watched the video, and organized all the blades into a little holder that it comes with, I had a much easier time. It really does come with everything you need besides a cutting board and a knife to get round fruits and vegetables flat before you cut them. I found it easy to clean and comes with special tools if you want to use, but spraying with water works pretty well. I use it mostly on apples, but it works with basically anything I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wong-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Watch the how to video, wear the glove, and you’ll be preparing food in half the time!
customer_reviews.text: I love my veggie chopper. If you watch the video (link provided in pkg, it makes starting out easier. I made a chopped Mediterranean salad first and just for the quality of the onion chop, it’s worth it. WEAR the safety glove! The blades are sharp. I hand washed everything and used the little cleaning scrapers and brush they provide for easy cleanup. This is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Margie's Grandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Can’t really chop. Don’t fall for it.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Can’t really chop. There is no cross blade, so you get long chunks. French fries will only be about 2” long because you need to cut the potatoes in half to fit. From the look of previous reviews, the glove they give you doesn’t work either. Looks flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFeather

customer_reviews.title: 7-in-1? Sign me up!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a spiralizer for zucchini... But this is so much more? The dicing and slicing.... Woot! It even juliennes veggies? Yes, please! I saw another, I think by the same seller (? Not sure) that also had a juicer attachment!! I opted out since I don't really juice anything, but if you do, you might want to look at that one :)
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen slicing tool.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great tool with plenty of versatility. The only problem I see with it is the fact that you cannot place an entire potato in it for french fries. I have to slice the potato in half but it does make great short french fries, sliced cottage fries, spiral cut vegetables, and easy to shred vegetables and potatoes for hash browns.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wedding

customer_reviews.title: Stand Behind Their Produce
customer_reviews.text: I used the Chopper to dice onions and it broke the very first time I used as the blades bent. I didn’t over stuff, but used 1/4 of an onion. I was able to realign the blades and tried again, this time with 1/8 of an onion. Same issue. I ended up needing to disregard and chop the old fashion way with a knife. However, after the review, I was contacted by the Company who offered me a full refund for my poor experience. While more rare today, the Company definitely stands behind their product, and I would feel confident trying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: "GET YOU A CHOPPA!" - Arnold in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster! No more crying over chopped onions! All of the attachments work great and I love the little storage container it comes with that allows you to neatly store all the attachments in a safe place. The only downfall I would say is that cleaning can be a tedious task with trying to clean out the nooks and crannies. However, don't let that deter you from buying this 23rd century chopping robot! Save a finger- use the chopper!
customer_reviews.author: Mckie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this product, false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, None of the cutter work!! Such a disappointment, need so much effort just to dice the onion, it supposed to make it easy but worse, false advertisement
customer_reviews.author: kenji h wong

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of getting one of these choppers, because I've seen some bad reviews over the years. But this one is great! I like to meal prep for the workweek and it made that process so much faster. I've diced onions, tomatoes, peppers (not great for sweet potatoes though). I've used the julienne blade for carrots and cucumbers and it's worked great! I was also pleased with the amount of attachments, gives a lot of options for one product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Compact tool with lots of food prep options!
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet tried all seven tools, but it did a great job of dicing onions, peppers, summer squash and zucchini. I was also impressed with how well the julienne blade worked with butternut squash. I was delighted that a safety glove is included, and everything stores compactly. I purchased this tool to replace separate diced and mandolin tools, and am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this product. It’s fun to use if you like to cook, like I do. The only thing I don’t really care for is the prong to stick the veggie on when using the spiralizer. It doesn’t keep the vegetable on very well so I ended up just using my hand. Also, the bristles fall out of the brush easily. Other than those two things I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are nice addition to the kitchen. It’s fun to use when making guacamole. It’s a little hard to clean because I’m scared of getting cut. And they are very sharp so be careful. My mom nicked herself and she had barely touched it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make my prep easier
customer_reviews.text: Not my bag of tea. Couldn’t chop onions, slicing potatoes was a bit scary and inconvenient, I do a better timing slicing it with a knife, and don’t get me started on the cleaning, chopping plate is still sitting on the counter: too dangerous to clean even with a brush. Overall, it was costly mistake, from now on I’ll invest in a better knives only
customer_reviews.author: ShoeJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chopper! So many attachments with a box to keep them organized! One thing I will say is that they write all the warnings about wearing the glove for a reason because these blades are sharp! I say this because I was stupid....didn’t listen, and....I gave myself a nice cut. Seriously this thing has been a game changer in the kitchen for me. My veggie prep takes half the time and it’s very easy to take apart and clean. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hisgirl71

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: I just chopped 20 minutes of vegetables in less than 5 minutes. This thing is great. Use the glove. That is the main reason I bought this one. I sliced, diced, and chopped vegetables at lightning speed. Easy to clean. There is a video on their website to show how to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Catt

customer_reviews.title: you have to use way too much body force
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be much easier to use since i have tendinitis in my wrists. However after struggling to dice ANYTHING- including a quarter inch thick piece of onion I had someone else attempt it and even they had to use body force and the back of their forearm to dice an onion and more force for a firm tomato. Only thing this was awesome for was making hash browns using the cheese grater.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Was missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months ago and was only using the veggi fine dicer and the medium dicer. Kept every thing else in their plastic packages. Today I went to look for the slice insert.. I found that it was not included in the box. Pretty bummed about it. I suggest if you buy this .. make sure all pieces are included before the return policy expires.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Flores

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: What I didn’t like about this product is that it is poorly constructed. It is not able to stand up to common, everyday vegetables like carrots and cabbage. The first sign was that the blades on the larger chopping insert bent after chopping potatoes. The second sign was that anything hard required additional force to push it through. While the versatility of the product was great, the fact that it cannot chop basic vegetables without struggling means that it is not fit for everyday use. If you plan to use it on anything harder than soft fruits and vegetables, I would encourage you to stay away from this product and buy a chopper with better construction.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Cannon

customer_reviews.title: You can be a real cutup with this machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the chopper you need especially if you have a lot to dice up at one time. It has razar sharp blades. It can dice a potato with minimal effort. Onions? You won't have to cry when using this chopper. You will like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing! Not that sharp and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this because I hate cutting onions. The blades are not that sharp and it will require insane force to push it down. The organizer thing is a nice addition but it could have been so much better and maybe attached to the whole thing. Extremely difficult to clean, expect to have veggies stuck in areas you cannot reach. The plastic seems very cheap and will probably break over time. The glove is a joke. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Daoud Ganama

customer_reviews.title: Does it all!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one device to use for food prep instead of the usual three or four tools I typically use and then have to clean. This does it all: chop mince dice etc. Perfect for the home cook who wants to wash fewer things after a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Pimms

customer_reviews.title: It's good for all but dicing.
customer_reviews.text: This works nicely for everything but dicing. Having a hinged press makes it difficult to make longer french fries. It would be much better if it had a press that went straight up and down on the vegetable. being at an angle has it push the vegetable forward more then down.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G

product_meta.title: Fullstar Vegetable Chopper Dicer Mandoline Slicer - Food Chopper Vegetable Spiralizer Vegetable Slicer - Onion Chopper Salad Chopper Veggie Chopper Vegetable Cutter Food Slicer 7 Blades
feature_bullets: BLADES ARE RAZOR SHARP TO ENSURE EASY SLICING, however this means you must use the safety glove at all times when operating to avoid injury.
7-IN-1 MANDOLIN SLICER AND CHOPPER offers the functionality of multiple kitchen tools with 7 interchangeable cutting blades. Free-up space on your countertop and use just 1 easy kitchen gadget.

1.2-QUART CATCH TRAY makes meal prep mess-free and easy. Molded finger guard and rubberized non-skid base ensure total safety and stability as you slice and dice carrots, cucumbers, potatoes and cheeses.
This compact slicer and dicer measures just 10.83"L x 4.65"W x 4.65"H and weighs 2.68 lbs. It can be fully disassembled for easy cleaning on the top shelf of your dishwasher.

READ THE MANUAL CAREFULLY - Please read the instruction manual provided with the Fullstar food chopper closely before use. If you have any questions or issues regarding the chopper please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,425 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
